abstract: Associated Press wins Pulitzer Prize for public service for coverage of slavery in the Southeast Asia fishing industry; play Hamilton, created by Lin-Manuel Miranda, receives prize for drama.

headline.print_headline: A.P. Wins Pulitzer for Public Service; ‘Hamilton’ Is Awarded Drama Prize
headline.main: 2016 Pulitzer Prizes: A.P. Wins Public Service Award; ‘Hamilton’ Is Honored

snippet: The New Yorker received the prizes for criticism and feature writing; The New York Times won for international reporting and photography.
lead_paragraph: The New Yorker received the prizes for criticism and feature writing; The New York Times won for international reporting and photography.
